OptIn.documentation: Allows using an API that requires explicit opt-in.

Serializable.documentation: From kotlinx.serialization. Marks a class as serializable.

Replicate.Model.documentation: Primary annotation to mark an interface for DTO generation.

variants.documentation: Required. Specifies which DTOs to generate.

autoContextual.documentation: Controls automatic @Contextual generation for serialization. Default: ENABLED.

Replicate.Property.documentation: Provides fine-grained control over a single property.

include.documentation: Explicitly includes this property only in the specified variants, ignoring model-level settings.

exclude.documentation: Excludes this property from the specified variants.

autoContextual.documentation: Overrides the model-level auto-contextual setting for this property. Default: INHERIT.

Replicate.Apply.documentation: Applies other annotations (like @Serializable) to generated DTOs.

annotations.documentation: Required. The annotation classes to apply.

include.documentation: Applies the annotations only to the specified variants.

exclude.documentation: Applies the annotations to all variants except the ones specified.

Replicate.SchemaVersion.documentation: Manually specifies a version number if not using the V<number> convention.

number.documentation: Required. The version number to assign.

Replicate.Hide.documentation: Disables code generation for the annotated model.

Serializable.documentation: From kotlinx.serialization. Marks a class as serializable.

Patchable.documentation: A wrapper for properties in PATCH variants.

members.name: Unchanged
members.documentation: Indicates the property is not being changed.

members.name: Set
members.documentation: Sets a new value for the property.
